permissions.commercialUse: No permission for commercial use of licensed material.
permissions.distribution: No permission to distribute licensed material.
permissions.modifications: No permission to modify licensed material.
permissions.patentUse: Patent rights from contributors not explicitely granted.
permissions.privateUse: No permission to use and modify in private.

conditions.discloseSource: Source code must be made available when the licensed material is distributed.
conditions.includeCopyright: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included with the licensed material.
conditions.includeCopyrightVSource: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included with the licensed material in source form, but is not required for binaries.
conditions.networkUseDisclosure: Users who interact with the licensed material via network are given the right to receive a copy of the source code.
conditions.sameLicense: Modifications must be released under the same license when distributing the licensed material. In some cases a similar or related license may be used.
conditions.sameLicenseVLibrary: Modifications must be released under the same license when distributing the licensed material. In some cases a similar or related license may be used, or this condition may not apply to works that use the licensed material as a library.
conditions.sameLicenseVFile: Modifications of existing files must be released under the same license when distributing the licensed material. In some cases a similar or related license may be used.
conditions.documentChanges: Changes made to the licensed material must be documented.

limitations.liability: This license includes a limitation of liability.
limitations.warranty: This license explicitly states that it does NOT provide any warranty.
limitations.trademarkUse: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant trademark rights, even though licenses without such a statement probably do not grant any implicit trademark rights.
limitations.patentUse: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant any rights in the patents of contributors.
